title: Subpart 1646-7 - Periodical Financial Reports-development
content:
Subpart 1646-7 - Periodical Financial Reports-development

State Regulations
§ 1646-7.1 - Monthly financial reports
§ 1646-7.2 - Quarterly financial reports
§ 1646-7.3 - Letter of transmittal and certificate
§ 1646-7.4 - Uniform balance sheet
§ 1646-7.5 - Reconciliation of bank balances
§ 1646-7.6 - Confirmation of bank balances
§ 1646-7.7 - Development Cost-Budget Control Statement, form DH-213
§ 1646-7.8 - Schedule of contract awards
§ 1646-7.9 - Schedule of investments
§ 1646-7.10 - Schedule of contingent liabilities
§ 1646-7.11 - Statement of site income and expense
§ 1646-7.12 - Statement of initial operating period income and expense
§ 1646-7.13 - Schedule of offsite clearance, rehabilitation, and relocation of buildings costs

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
